Overview For gstVRMLError Members Chapter

gstVRMLError

gstVRMLError

gstVRMLError( const gstVRMLError& err ) ;

~gstVRMLError

~gstVRMLError( ) ;

operator=

gstVRMLError& operator=( const gstVRMLError& err ) ;

GetError

gstVRMLErrorType GetError( ) const;

Return the specific error type.

GetLine

int GetLine( ) const;

Return the line number which was current when error encountered.

GetMSG

const char* GetMSG( ) const;

Return the last parsed text string when error encountered.
